import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import * as data from "../../../../../shared/data/dashboard/crypto"; @Component({ selector: "app-transactions", templateUrl: "./transactions.component.html", styleUrls: ["./transactions.component.scss"], }) export class TransactionsComponent { public openTab: string = "All"; public transactions = data.transactions; public filterData = this.transactions; constructor() {} public tabbed(val: string) { this.openTab = val; this.filterData = val !== "All" ? this.transactions.filter((data: any) => { return data.type == this.openTab ? true : false; }) : this.transactions; } }
